metadata.name: Compressed File Creation Via Tar.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects execution of "tar.exe" in order to create a compressed file. Adversaries may abuse various utilities to compress or encrypt data before exfiltration.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\tar.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('bsdtar') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-c')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-r')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-u'))))

output.summary: Detects execution of "tar.exe" in order to create a compressed file. Adversaries may abuse various utilities to compress or encrypt data before exfiltration.
